Package controller

Class TablePaneController<I extends WithID>

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller
      • controller.TablePaneController<I>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - Class representing the items to which table rows correspond
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Refreshable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AppointmentsController, CustomersController
    public abstract class TablePaneController<I extends WithID>
extends Controller
implements Refreshable
    Base class for a controller that manages a particular tab of the main window. Each tab is assumed to contain data that can be refreshed to make consistent with the changes made to the database by other users. It provides hooks for a standard add, modify, delete, and refresh buttons. It also provides a few tools that are generally useful to tabs showing data.
    Author:
    Joseph T. Lapp

      • deleteSelection

        protected void deleteSelection​(DatabaseOperation<I> operation)
        Deletes the selected item indirectly via the provided reference to a database operation. The method abstracts the logic of deleting items so that it need not be repeated in each controller.

        LAMBDA - Reduces the amount of code I have to write by comparison to the alternative, which would have been to write a method for handling delete confirmation, passing that method to showAndConfirm() instead.

        Parameters:
        operation - Implementation for deleting the item from the database

      • modifySelection

        protected void modifySelection​(DatabaseOperation<I> operation)
        Modifies the selected item indirectly via the provided reference to a database operation. The method abstracts the logic of modifying items so that it need not be repeated in each controller.
        Parameters:
        operation - Implementation for modifying the item in the database

      • showNotice

        protected void showNotice​(java.lang.String message)
        Displays a temporary, initially-blinking notice in the notice label.
        Parameters:
        message - Message to display in the notice label

      • scheduleNoticeBlink

        private void scheduleNoticeBlink​(boolean visible,
                                 int count,
                                 long millis)
        Schedules a change in visibility of the notice label.
        Parameters:
        visible - Whether to show or hide the notice next
        count - Number of times the notice has blinked
        millis - Number of milliseconds before making the change
